and Ori Yagishi from Tsubaki Factory.

This is the first episode of the year 2024! Stay!
I know it's a little late, but Happy New Year! And the day before yesterday was Coming of Age Day, wasn't it?
As of this recording, I haven't had my Coming-of-Age Day yet, but I, Yagi, went to take a pre-shoot for my furisode (long-sleeved kimono).
I'll tell you what kind of furisode I wore.
I wore a furisode that used a lot of classic colors and had some pictures of cranes on it.
I wore a furisode that had a little bit of individuality within the classic atmosphere.
What would you like to wear, Ichika?
I would like to wear a light blue and yellow furisode.
The reason is that light blue is my member's color.
Yellow has been my favorite color since I was a child, and I have sold it to many people.
I don't know how light blue and yellow would work together, but
I would like to try it on.
Project 2024 Winter 3 of Us has started!
I belong to Tsubaki Factory, which is in Team A with Morning Musume 24 and Beyonce.

I'm trying my best to create a cool atmosphere, so I'd like you all to see my performance.

Of course, the group has its own individuality, but each member has a very distinct pastel color.
My impression is that they have distinct personalities, and I am really looking forward to seeing how the clash of personalities will come together.

The thing I'm most worried about is
The first thing that comes to mind when I see you at your first solo overseas concert is food.
What did you eat?
In Hong Kong, I was given a solid meal that was pretty much like Koros food.
I had a good meal in Hong Kong, which was like Koros food.
Pigeon's chicks, abalone, and so on.
I was served food that I had never eaten before.
I also remember that I was served food that I had never eaten before, such as pigeon chicks and abalone.
In Taiwan, we were served baked or steamed parcels, baked eringi mushrooms, and fruit.
I also remember eating baked and steamed xiaolongbao, eringi mushrooms, and fruit, which I had never had before.
It had a different sweetness from Japanese fruit.
It was very sweet and very delicious.
It was the first thing that came to my mind.
It's so cute!
Thank you very much.
One more thing, about the classical singing videos...
Is there a difference in vocalization and other things?
It's totally different.
I see.
It's very different from a sensory point of view.
I think the listener can feel the difference as well.
The range you can produce is also very different.
I'm not sure if it's new to me.
I don't know if it's right to call it new, but I think it's a little different.
I hope you will be able to see a side of me that I have not been able to show you very often.
I'm looking forward to it.
I'll do my best.

I'm looking forward to seeing Juice-Juice, Angstrom, and Ochanoma in each show, and I've never had a chance to talk with them before,
I am also aware of the fact that I have not had many opportunities to talk with them before, and I am also aware of the fact that I am graduating,
I am not the type to go out of my way to talk to people, so I am looking forward to talking to the younger, newer members of the group,
I am excited to have the opportunity to talk with new, younger students.
Graduation is approaching, but I don't think about it too much in the group activities,
I don't think that I will be conscious of it in our group activities, and I don't think that I will be thinking about it as the last time or anything like that,
But I am sure that I will be able to feel it when we get closer to the end,
Until then, I hope to enjoy the activities of Juice-Juice.
I hope you will continue to support us.
I hope you will continue to support us. STE!

I'll do my best.

Arisawa Ichika, living in the moment.
What does it mean?
Well, I often look back on my past.
I live in the present based on the lessons I learned in my teenage years and what I learned through music.

I'm going to do the best I can now.

I want to make that beautiful flower bloom, and I want to make that beautiful flower bloom in the song, in fake or in unison.

I would like to share my specialties and interests with you, and I hope that you will be inspired to build the Tsubaki Factory.

That's why I want to make Juice Juice bloom with many flowers.
The idea that if there are a lot of flowers, they can be seen from a distance, so people will notice them is really wonderful.

Project 2024 Winter 3 of Us is now underway.
Team A will perform in Sendai on January 13. Team B will perform in Osaka on January 20. Please come and see them.
Tsubaki Factory's new album "3rd Moment" will be released on February 21.
There are 4 new songs included in the album,
There are 4 new songs on the album, including a song written by Ai Shock of Shonanokaze and Takuya Nakajima, so I hope you will enjoy them.
Tsubaki Factory's major debut 7th anniversary live will be held on March 10 at Ichikawa City Cultural Hall.
I am really looking forward to it, so I would be happy if you could come.
I am also looking forward to seeing you at the "Carbon Neutral Movement 2024 by Satoyasato Preliminary Movement" to be held on March 30 and 31 at Makuhari Messe in Chiba Prefecture.
I am really looking forward to this one as well.
I am very much looking forward to it as well. Project members will appear more and more on this channel.
New videos will be uploaded every Wednesday, so please subscribe to the channel.
This time we were joined by Arisa Aoi Chika of Juice- Juice and Ori Yanagishita of Tsubaki Factory.
Farewell!
